projectGridLines.title: Project 1  Title: MTS Intern,  Project 2  Title:  MTS Intern
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1

Title: MTS Intern

Description: As an Intern you will work as part of a team of skilled system engineers accountable for participating in the development, debugging, maintenance & testing.  As part of the Research and Development function, system software engineers focus on enhancements to existing products as well as new product development, needing a deep working knowledge of file systems.

Skill sets: C, C++, Unix/Linux System Programming, Multithreaded programming, algorithms, data structures.

Traits expectation: 

Expected learning: 

Specific courses required for project execution:  

Project 2

Title:  MTS Intern 

Description: HFS team in NetApp works towards developing and enhancing High performance WAFL filesystem and cutting edge modern solutions built on top of that, for instance, Storage Efficiency technologies, Point in time Clone creation & restoration, Data protection and recovery to OnPrem and Cloud, Data encryption, Ransomware protection,  and similar others. This internship experience will provide profound insight to anyone joining our team into File System, Operating System and Storage System concepts enabling them to excel in any of the domains of their interest.



Skill sets: languages â€“ C / C++ / Python, Programming skills with multi-threading, complex algorithms and problem solving


Traits expectation: 

Expected learning:
